title: Car Engines Sound Pack
description: The Car Engine sound pack contains 294 sound effects, including city, sports, diesel and off-road vehicle.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/car-engines-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/zmMiOHQLMSE

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/d4ba72kzv4gta12/MSE%20-%20Car%20Engines.pdf?dl=0


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 28 fast and 28 slow acceleration sounds
  • 28 fast and 28 slow deceleration sounds
  • 70 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 112 transition sounds between speeds


Total in the package of 14 types of cars, among which 8 city, 4 sports, 1 diesel, 1 off-road. All sounds have been created in a realistic style, using realistic vehicle samples.


With so many variations of car engine sounds, this package is perfect for creating engine roar sounds for realistic cars, including racing cars. It can also be used to create futuristic light vehicles. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 294 game-ready sound effects.
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo.
  • 14 cars in total. 
  • 8 city cars, 4 sport cars, 1 diesel, 1 off-road.
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, mid, high very high.
  • 70 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total.
  • 56 acceleration sounds, 56 deceleration sounds.
  • 112 transition sounds between engine rpm.
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and others.

 

Number of Audio Waves: 294

Number of Audio Cues: 294

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 39 minutes 12 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
